title: Poser Target View Linda 2 Update
description:
marketplace.target-view.nl/products/Linda.html

Latest update 31 may 2014
for now Linda has only been updated for Smith Micro Poser 10 / 2014 

Linda is a wonderfull gorgeous girl for the Poser platform.
So now and then she can be very shy, but it's your task to help her to get over it.
Once you have earned her trust, she's a friend forever.

compatible with poser 10 / 2014 Unimesh.
Daz Studio 4.6 native figure files included.
Use Linda's Scaling to create cartooney effects.
Joanna Character and Mats with SS
Morphs for expressions
Motionbuilder visemes.
Breasts build with bones and morphs
15 morphs for the Vagina.
2 morphs for the Anus
+/- 300 Morphs Allready in this package.
Handposes in Linda's Hands
Stretch and Squash Features
Advanced feet control
Wardrobe Wizard Compatible
Get a license at PhilC Designs
24 texture files up to 4096*4096 px
Mat Files :
Joanna
Joanna Bright Scatter
Joanna Bright Satter no Pony
Joanna no Pony
Joanna V2 

Additional Notes:

HIDE UNHIDE FILES

Set Linda to traditional skinning for the show hide files to work.
Then set back to unimesh, now select a bodypart and make it invisible and visible,
all the parts that were made invisible by the Hide - Unhide files will now be invisible.

GENITALS

Use the genitals with Linda set to Unimesh.

Joanna Morphs

Pony - No Pony
These morphs are intended to use with the MAT Files :
Joanna
Joanna Bright Scatter
Joanna Bright Scatter No Pony
Joanna No Pony
